welcome_message_body: "Welcome to South River, a charming city known for its small-town charm and friendly atmosphere. We're excited to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all the beauty and charm our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi service is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, primarily used by United Airlines for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, primarily used by United Airlines for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, primarily used by United Airlines for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network for up to 30 minutes at a time.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing exclusive services and amenities for its passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
